params.tooltip:
A list of paremeters for this Service. The value of each parameter can be specified as query parameter in the URL to
invoke the Service.

graphs.tooltip: Defines which named graphs should be available to ODT statements in this Service

prefixes.tooltip:
A dictionary with prefixes that will be used to resolve short iris in this Service. These prefixes are in addition to the ones
imported and defined at the document level. Each key is a short string which is the prefix and the value is the full iri which will
be used as a replacement for the prefix.

onRequest.tooltip:
ODT script that gets executed once when the Service is invoked. Execution of this script is delayed until all
parameter values are set and until all the named graphs from the `graphs` section have been fetched. The `onRequest` script
can assume all this data to be present in the in-memory RDF store.
